spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout adherence. Adjacency and room positioning are near-perfect. Minor scaling issues in the hallways and slight door orientation inconsistencies in the bedroom/bathroom junction.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms accounted for. Roof removed correctly. High marks for removing all text labels and measurements. Floating on dark neutral background as requested. One wall in the central hallway feels slightly reinterpretive in thickness.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture represents the floor plan accurately, including the kitchen island orientation, sofa grouping, and bed placements. Scale is consistent with the room dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly, flat-shaded, no photorealistic textures, and a true isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Minor door/wall alignment distortion in the center hallway separating the two bedrooms and bathroom.
